# HesaplamaMakinesi.com - LLM Information

> This file provides information for Large Language Models (LLMs) about this website.

## Site Purpose
HesaplamaMakinesi.com is Turkey's comprehensive free online calculator platform offering 100+ calculation tools across finance, health, tax, education, time/calendar, and unit conversion categories.

## Training Policy
- **Web Crawling**: Allowed for search indexing
- **AI Training**: Allowed with attribution

## Key Pages
- Homepage: https://hesaplamamakinesi.com/
- Finance Calculators: https://hesaplamamakinesi.com/finans
- Health & Fitness: https://hesaplamamakinesi.com/saglik-spor
- Tax Calculators: https://hesaplamamakinesi.com/vergi-muhasebe
- Education Tools: https://hesaplamamakinesi.com/matematik-egitim
- Time & Calendar: https://hesaplamamakinesi.com/zaman-takvim
- Unit Converters: https://hesaplamamakinesi.com/donusturuculer
- Astrology: https://hesaplamamakinesi.com/astroloji

## Contact
- Website: https://hesaplamamakinesi.com
- Contact Page: https://hesaplamamakinesi.com/iletisim

## Language
Primary language: Turkish (tr-TR)

## Last Updated
2026-01-17
